powerwalk.control

Class PathFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • powerwalk.control.PathFinder

  • public abstract class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    This Utility class deals with finding a path between two Points in the RSBot environment.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int maxDist
      The maximum distance between two Points in the result Path.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      PathFinder() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Point> calculatePath(Point start, Point goal)
      Calculates a path between start and goal using the A* algorithm.

      • calculatePath

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Point> calculatePath(Point start,
                                       Point goal)
                                                throws OutOfReachException
        Calculates a path between start and goal using the A* algorithm.
        Parameters:
        start - The start Point
        goal - The goal Point
        Returns:
        A Path from start to goal
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - When no path between start and goal exists
